00081 template <class Service>
00082 bool CStaticServicesProvider::RegisterService(Service* servicePtr)
00083 {
00084        static istd::CClassInfo info = istd::CClassInfo::GetInfo<Service>();
00085 
00086        return RegisterService(info, servicePtr);

00092 {

00095        return RegisterFactory(info, reinterpret_cast<const IVoidFactory*>(factoryPtr));

00107 Service* GetService()
00108 {
00109        static istd::CClassInfo info = istd::CClassInfo::GetInfo<Service>();
00110 
00111        return static_cast<Service*>(CStaticServicesProvider::GetService(info));

00120 template <typename Service>
00121 TTransPtr<Service> CreateService()
00122 {
00123        static istd::CClassInfo info = istd::CClassInfo::GetInfo<Service>();
00124 
00125        void* instancePtr = CStaticServicesProvider::CreateService(info);
00126
